Package com.mozilla.secops.postprocessing

Pipeline for further processing of and correlation between alerts

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PostProcessing.PostProcessingOptions
    Runtime options for PostProcessing pipeline.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlertSummary
    Summarize alerts and various attributes of alerts over time and generate subsequent alerts if certain thresholds or anomolies are detected.
    PostProcessing
    PostProcessing implements analysis of alerts generated by other pipelines.
    PostProcessing.Parse
    Parse incoming events and filter to only include events of type Alert
    PostProcessing.WatchlistAnalyze
    Check incoming alert events against a watchlist of various identifiers.

Package com.mozilla.secops.postprocessing Description

Pipeline for further processing of and correlation between alerts
